base_description: Wide, flat-screen black television with a stand.
part_description: Features a rectangular screen, thin bezels, and a central stand. The screen is wide and flat, while the stand is a flat, rectangular base supporting the screen upright.
internal_interaction_description: The screen is securely attached to the stand, allowing it to remain upright. The bezels frame the screen, housing internal electronics and controls. The stand provides stability and balance, ensuring the screen is positioned at an optimal viewing angle.
external_interaction_description: Interacts with external devices like remote controls, gaming consoles, and streaming devices through ports and wireless connections. Positioned on furniture, it provides visual entertainment to viewers, who can adjust settings via remote or built-in buttons.
